snippet.title: Darwin's Paradox! | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Darwin’s Paradox!, a new, action-adventure platformer will be coming to PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo® Switch and Steam®.

Meet Darwin, an octopus plucked out of his natural habitat and thrust into a chaotic world supplanted by UFOOD INC. where a devious plan for world domination is unraveling.  

Tap into your octopus instincts to sneak through hostile territories patrolled by the very human—and definitely not alien—UFOOD INC. Using Darwin’s sucker-lined arms to maneuver past foes, players must use the mastery of the mollusk to deceive and distract with camouflage and carefully timed ink shots, utilizing the environment to gain the advantage. 

For more information on Darwin’s Paradox!, visit https://www.konami.com/games/darwins_paradox
